directions: Combine spinach, mango, avocado, powdered lemonade mix, sugar substitute, and water in a blender; blend until thick and frothy.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon powdered lemonade mix (such as Country Time®)
1 packet stevia sugar substitute (such as Truvia®)
title: Spinach, Avocado, and Mango Smoothie | Allrecipes
